<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Share Burden](/Spells.aspx?ID=612)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=49)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** An ally within 30 feet is about to attempt a saving throw against a harmful [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effect, and you would not otherwise have to save against the effect.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Target** you and the triggering ally.
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You shoulder some of your ally’s pain. Both you and your ally use the outcome one degree of success better than the result of your ally’s saving throw, even if the triggering effect usually affects only one target.
name: Share Burden
